channel.title: To all Devs
channel.description:
Hello to you guys from Ireland.
Just a quick post to say that we're eagerly waiting on BMS here as well as all over the globe, but rather then the usual "OMG I can't believe it's not out yet" I think a positive note of encouragement is in order. Keep up the great work team.
Dilo!

item.title: To all Devs
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Why thank you very much Dilogoat and welcome to the forums. Please feel free to sit back and lurk while you take a look at some important announcements like the FAQ, Ask a Question and Offer a Suggestion threads.

Read full topic

item.title: To all Devs
item.dc:creator: wafflewarrior7
item.description:
I agree. Though their not putting all of their time into it, I can’t say their not working their hardest. Great job, and good luck. I think all of the british are waiting too…

Read full topic

item.title: To all Devs
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
So you’re saying the entire population of Ireland is eagerly waiting for Black Mesa to come out? How can you be sure?
